Private Litigation Case Title: Robrinzine v. Big Lots Stores, Inc.
Goodson v. Big Lots Stores Inc and related cases
Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/768835/000114036110036489/form10q.htm#e
Notes: A collective action case initially filed in 2004 on behalf of assistant store managers had a complicated court history. After more than 170 related individual actions were later filed, the company decided to settle all the cases for a total of $4 million. The settlement agreement was sealed by the court at the request of the parties, but the company disclosed the settlement amount in an SEC filing.
